file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-26-08-04 - EXHAUST HOSES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EXHAUST HOSES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. The two exhaust hoses are installed at the forward electronic-compartment air exhaustion system (between frames 5 and 6). The removal/installation procedures are applicable to the two exhaust hoses. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 21-26-08-000-801-A EXHAUST HOSES - REMOVAL ALL 21-26-08-400-801-A EXHAUST HOSES - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-26-08 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-26-08-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EXHAUST HOSES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the exhaust hoses. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - SB145-21-0013 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113CZ Nose-landing-gear compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the overhead circuit breaker panel, open the EXHAUST 1 and EXHAUST 2 circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them. (2) Open access panel 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Loosen the clamps (2) which attach the exhaust hose (1) (on aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-21-0013) or the reinforced exhaust hose (5) (on aircraft POST-MOD SB 145-21-0013) to the check valve (3) and to the duct (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-26-08 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the exhaust hose (1) (on aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-21-0013) or the reinforced exhaust hose (5) (on aircraft POST-MOD SB 145-21-0013). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-26-08 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

ZONES 213 214 AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Exhaust Hoses - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A DET. A 3. CHECK VALVE 3 2. CLAMP 1 1. EXHAUST HOSE 2 5. REINFORCED EXHAUST HOSE DET. B 3 2. CLAMP 1 PRE-MOD SB 145-21-0013 4. DUCT 2 POST-MOD SB 145-21-0013 3 TORQUE: 1.69-2.25 Nm (15-20 lb.in) (POST-MOD ONLY) EM145AMM211248A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-26-08 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-26-08-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. EXHAUST HOSES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the exhaust hoses. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT VENTILATION SYS- AMM TASK 21-26-00-700-801-A/500 TEM - OPERATIONAL CHECK SB145-21-0013 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113CZ Nose-landing-gear compartment D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench To tighten the clamps available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the exhaust hose (1) (on aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-21-0013) or the reinforced exhaust hose (5) (on aircraft POST-MOD SB 145-21-0013) in the installation position. (2) On aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-21-0013, tighten the clamps (2) which attach the exhaust hose (1) to the check valve (3) and to the duct (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-26-08 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) On aircraft POST-MOD SB145-21-0013, tighten the clamps (2) which attach the reinforced exhaust hose (5) to the check valve (3) and to the duct (4) with a torque of 1.69-2.25 N.m (15-20 lb.in). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access panel 113CZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) On the overhead circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags from the EXHAUST 1 and EXHAUST 2 circuit breakers and close them. (3) Do AMM TASK 21-26-00-700-801-A/500. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-26-08 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
